channel.title: Comments for page "2 B A Master"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "2 B A Master"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Top sp. jounin works - I did this once. U should be 51+ lvl (or a bit less, if u'll lvl up the rest next day) sp. jonin. If after dayroll u are top 3 sp. jonin, do jounin exams and have a golden item ^_^ Else try another day. If u'll get top1 - loop(if u'll have enough levels) and get OOT theme if u have no. :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Top 3 anything will work, you just have to get to the point where you can start the quest before the next dayroll

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Easiest way to do it period is to just go for the favor. 7500 MPH is really easy to get, and it's much easier than getting Top 3.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Top 3 sp jonin wouldn't work. You need to be a jonin level 51+ or a sannin to do this mission.
This means your options are:
top 3 jonin
top 3 sannin+
top 3 in season group (groups are: season 1, season 2, season 3, and season 4+)

Jonin daily ranking is about 3-4 million. Sannin is well over 10 million.
Season 1 and 2 are 1 to 1.5 million.
Season 3 is 3-4 million (slightly lower than jonin).
Season 4 is well over 10 million.

Easiest way to do it will than be:
Season 1 through 3: Sannin aiming for top 3 in season.
Season 4+: Jonin aiming for top 3 jonin. Or just use storm favor.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: yes. i've done it twice. its the very reason why said favor exists.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Can a storm favor be used in order to succed this quest?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: top 3 anything. if you are top 3 sp jonin and go jonin, you qualify for top 3 player. if you aren't on the top 3 players, but you are a top 3 sannin, you qualify, etc, etc, etc.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: In season 1, can you be a top three jonin for this? Or you need to be a top three S1?
